mapper.delete: delete from table_collect where read_id=#{readId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select u.user_nickname,r.id,r.read_writer,r.read_content, r.read_image,r.read_zan,r.read_commentNum from table_collect c left join table_user u on u.id = c.user_id left join table_read r on r.id = c.read_id where c.user_id = #{userId}
